answers.answer: Did you not have to fast for the one hour test?
No they didn't tell me to fast for the 1 hour test but I technically did because I go to bed before 12 and when I got up the next morning I went straight to the doctors office

Random. I mean, good thing you pretty much did anyways but I'm pretty sure they were supposed to tell you to fast. Did you eat or drink anything before your appt once you woke up? I've never had to go back and do the 3 hour test but I've heard of many ladies that failed the one hour and then passed the 3 hour.
I didn't eat or drink anything before the appointment other than the drink they gave me and water

Usually for the one hour test they say to eat something small before hand. I don't know you're chances on passing the three hour test bc I've never had to take it but I'm guessing if you didn't pass the one hour test your chances of passing the three hour test isn't too high. Good luck though I hope you do pass nd everything is fine. Diabetes runs in my family too so I kno how worried you are

question: I took my 1 hour Blood Glucose test over a week ago and I got the results back and I failed. I believe average is 69-139 and my levels were a 159. What are the chances that I can pass my 3 hour fasting blood glucose test? Diabetes runs in the family and I'm kind of worried?
title: What are the chances I'll pass?
